title: Passed in children (Function|Component) to Component are rendered inconsistently
body:
**Do you want to request a *feature* or report a *bug*?** Bug **What is the current behavior?** When passing a function as a child that returns a ReactElement to another component that performs conditional rendering this function gets called before the Render function inside the component that should render children. However, if some another component is passed as a child instead of a function, then everything goes as expected and child component is rendered after the parent component. Did this work in previous versions of React?** Same behaviour on: "^16.5.2" & "16.3.2"
